meta.title: Terms and Conditions | AquaDecor
meta.description: Handcrafted aquarium backgrounds terms, 20-year warranty, and payment policies.

sections.heading: Payments
sections.content: All payments are made in advance. Aquadecor has the right to require advance payment of 100% of the order value to start the handcrafted production process.

sections.heading: 20-Year Warranty
sections.content: Our products come with a 20-year structural warranty. This covers the integrity of the material and color under normal aquarium use.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | AquaDecor
meta.description: How we handle your data and protect your privacy.

sections.heading: Information Collection
sections.content: We collect your name, address, and email solely to process orders and provide shipping updates. We do not sell your data to third parties.

sections.heading: Cookies
sections.content: We use essential cookies to keep track of your cart and session. By using our site, you agree to this usage.

meta.title: Shipping Policy | AquaDecor
meta.description: Worldwide shipping via DHL Express and FedEx. Information on customs and duties.

sections.heading: Customs and Import Fees
sections.content: We ship from Serbia. All prices shown on the website include product cost, packaging, and shipping, but DO NOT include potential customs/import fees. You may be charged import duties by your government prior to delivery. Aquadecor is not responsible for these costs.

sections.heading: Delivery Times
sections.content: Production takes 10-12 business days. Once shipped via DHL Express, delivery typically takes 3-5 business days worldwide.

meta.title: Refund Policy | AquaDecor
meta.description: Order cancellation fees and return policies for custom backgrounds.

sections.heading: Cancellation Policy
sections.content: If you want to cancel your order before we ship it, you will be charged a cancellation fee of 40% of the total value of your order. This covers the non-recoverable labor and material costs of your custom-sized product.

sections.heading: Returns
sections.content: Due to the nature of custom-made aquarium backgrounds, we do not accept returns for correctly manufactured items that match your provided dimensions.
